00068 struct SyncRootStats {
00069     uint64_t updatesDone;           /*< number of sync tree root updates done */
00070     uint64_t lastUpdateMicros;      /*< last elapsed update time (microsecs) */
00071     uint64_t comparesDone;          /*< number of sync tree compares completed */
00072     uint64_t lastCompareMicros;     /*< last elapsed compare time (microsecs) */
00073     uint64_t nodesCreated;          /*< number of new nodes created */
00074     uint64_t nodesShared;           /*< number of nodes shared */
00075     
00076     uint64_t rootAdviseSent;        /*< number of RootAdvise interests sent */
00077     uint64_t nodeFetchSent;         /*< number of NodeFetch interests sent */
00078     uint64_t contentFetchSent;      /*< number of content fetch interests sent */
00079     
00080     uint64_t rootAdviseSeen;        /*< number of RootAdvise interests received */
00081     uint64_t nodeFetchSeen;         /*< number of NodeFetch interests received */
00082     
00083     uint64_t rootAdviseReceived;    /*< number of RootAdvise responses received */
00084     uint64_t nodeFetchReceived;     /*< number of NodeFetch responses received */
00085     uint64_t contentFetchReceived;  /*< number of content objects received */
00086     
00087     uint64_t rootAdviseBytes;       /*< number of bytes for RootAdvise responses */
00088     uint64_t nodeFetchBytes;        /*< number of bytes for NodeFetch responses */
00089     uint64_t contentFetchBytes;     /*< number of bytes for content objects */
00090 
00091     uint64_t rootAdviseTimeout;     /*< number of RootAdvise response timeouts */
00092     uint64_t nodeFetchTimeout;      /*< number of NodeFetch response timeouts */
00093     uint64_t contentFetchTimeout;   /*< number of content object response timeouts */
00094     
00095     uint64_t rootAdviseFailed;      /*< number of RootAdvise response failures */
00096     uint64_t nodeFetchFailed;       /*< number of NodeFetch response failures */
00097     uint64_t contentFetchFailed;    /*< number of content object response failures */
00098     
00099 };

00101 struct SyncRootDeltas {
00102     struct SyncRootDeltas *next;        /*< link to next update */

00112 };
